statements: SELECT * FROM loan_requests;
SELECT request_id, borrower_id, loan_amount FROM loan_requests;
SELECT loan_amount, request_date FROM loan_requests WHERE request_status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM loan_requests ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT request_id, request_status FROM loan_requests WHERE loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT * FROM loan_requests WHERE loan_amount > 10000 ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT borrower_id, SUM(loan_amount) AS total_loan_amount FROM loan_requests GROUP BY borrower_id HAVING total_loan_amount > 50000;
SELECT DISTINCT borrower_id FROM loan_requests WHERE request_status = 'approved' ORDER BY borrower_id ASC;
SELECT request_id, loan_amount, request_status FROM loan_requests WHERE request_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31' AND loan_amount < 15000;
SELECT * FROM loan_requests WHERE request_status IN ('pending', 'approved') ORDER BY request_status ASC, request_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM LoanRequests;
SELECT id, requester_name FROM LoanRequests;
SELECT id, requester_name, loan_amount FROM LoanRequests WHERE loan_amount > 1000;
SELECT id, requester_name, loan_amount, request_date FROM LoanRequests ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT approval_id, approval_date, approver_name FROM LoanApprovals WHERE approved_amount < 5000;
SELECT * FROM LoanRequests;
SELECT requester_name, loan_amount FROM LoanRequests WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM LoanRequests ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT requester_name, loan_amount, request_date FROM LoanRequests WHERE requester_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT a.approval_id, a.approver_name, r.requester_name FROM LoanApprovals a INNER JOIN LoanRequests r ON a.request_id = r.id;
SELECT * FROM loan_requests;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM loan_requests WHERE loan_amount > 1000;
SELECT request_id, request_date FROM loan_requests ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM loan_requests WHERE borrower_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT approval_id, approval_status FROM loan_approvals WHERE approval_status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM loan_requests;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM loan_requests WHERE request_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT request_id, borrower_name, loan_amount FROM loan_requests WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT lr.borrower_name, la.approved_by, lt.tracking_status FROM loan_requests lr JOIN loan_approvals la ON lr.request_id = la.request_id JOIN loan_tracking lt ON la.approval_id = lt.approval_id;
SELECT approval_id, approval_date, approved_by, approval_status FROM loan_approvals WHERE approval_status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM decentralized_loan_requests;
SELECT request_id, borrower_name, loan_amount, request_date FROM decentralized_loan_approvals;
SELECT approval_id, approver_name, approval_date, approved_amount FROM decentralized_loan_payments;
SELECT report_id, request_id, approval_id, payment_id, report_date, report_summary FROM decentralized_loan_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT request_id, borrower_name, loan_amount, request_date FROM decentralized_loan_requests WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM decentralized_loan_requests;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM decentralized_loan_requests WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount, request_date FROM decentralized_loan_requests ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount, approval_id FROM decentralized_loan_requests JOIN decentralized_loan_approvals ON decentralized_loan_requests.request_id = decentralized_loan_approvals.request_id;
SELECT approver_name, approval_date, approved_amount FROM decentralized_loan_approvals WHERE approved_amount >= 10000 ORDER BY approval_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM loan_requests;
SELECT request_id, borrower_name FROM loan_requests;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM loan_requests WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT approver_name, approval_date FROM loan_approvals ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT borrower_name, contact_number, email_address FROM borrowers;
SELECT * FROM loan_requests ORDER BY request_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM loan_requests WHERE loan_amount > 5000 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT lr.borrower_name, la.approver_name, ls.status FROM loan_requests lr INNER JOIN loan_approvals la ON lr.request_id = la.request_id INNER JOIN loan_statuses ls ON lr.request_id = ls.request_id ORDER BY lr.request_date ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT lr.borrower_name, la.approver_name, ls.status FROM loan_requests lr INNER JOIN loan_approvals la ON lr.request_id = la.request_id INNER JOIN loan_statuses ls ON lr.request_id = ls.request_id WHERE ls.status = 'Approved' ORDER BY lr.request_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT b.borrower_name, b.contact_number, b.email_address, lr.loan_amount FROM borrowers b INNER JOIN loan_requests lr ON b.borrower_name = lr.borrower_name ORDER BY lr.loan_amount DESC LIMIT 5
